item.title: IPFS ideas for InstantOS
item.description: IPFS Ideas for InstantOS by Federico “EvilScript” Torrielli Part 1: small introduction to IPFS (and problems) IPFS is a very recent distributed (file) system that works like an always-on peer-to-peer program in the background. IPFS works with peers and gateways. Peers are, to be simple, computers. Gateways are centralized systems that bridge between the file that you want via a link and the IPFS network. They work like normal web-servers but they just convert a HTTP link into an IPFS resource.
